Name: A comparison of denoising approaches for spoken word production related artefacts in continuous multiband fMRI data
EthicsApprovals: Metro North Health and QUT HREC (HREC/15/QRBW/447 and 2015-1148-1620)
ReferencesAndLinks: Angelique Volfart, Katie L. McMahon, Greig I. de Zubicaray; A Comparison of Denoising Approaches for Spoken Word Production Related Artefacts in Continuous Multiband fMRI Data. Neurobiology of Language 2024; doi: https://doi.org/10.1162/nol_a_00151
